body:
> Is there any experience out there to share regarding installing Daysim 
> (Linux version) on a Mac PPC running OS 10.4 ?
It is not possible like that. You can either install an emulator, which 
will emulate a x86-machine with linux, on your Mac and run it in there, 
or you have to convince the Daysim-folks to compile a universal binary 
for OS X. The problem is that Daysim is compiled for an entirely 
different platform (x86) then yours (ppc).


CU Lars.
___
